title: 201. Andy & DJ CTI: CNN Producer 'Ashamed' After Arrest, Brawl At Miami Airport & Pentagon Combating Extremism
itunes:title: 201. Andy & DJ CTI: CNN Producer 'Ashamed' After Arrest, Brawl At Miami Airport & Pentagon Combating Extremism
description: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss longtime CNN producer John Griffin being 'ashamed' after arrest for child sex trafficking, the brawl at Miami International airport which resulted in 2 men in custody, and the Pentagon's updated rules to combat rising extremism.
content:encoded: In today's episode, Andy & DJ discuss longtime CNN producer John Griffin being 'ashamed' after arrest for child sex trafficking, the brawl at Miami International airport which resulted in 2 men in custody, and the Pentagon's updated rules to combat rising extremism.
